fields.value:
Do not touch. May be cold.
Town (Protective)
Attack: Basic
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Stand guard at a player's house, roleblocking their visitors if someone tries to attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Players you roleblock are given Frost (see Everfrost).
> When you die, give all your visitors Frost.
> Roleblock Immunity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose the Town.
